answers.answer: Well, I know that spots and vision changes can be associated with preeclampsia and other health issues. It may also be no big deal though. Drink a lot of water to stay hydrated and call your doctor just to keep them in the loop. They may want you to come in and it's always better to be safe than sorry. Good luck!
Thanks! I called my Dr and they sent me to L&D - now the waiting game.

question: I'm seeing what I can only describe as sparks in my vision.  It happened for the first time this morning and I just walked around Walmart for about 20 minutes and it's happening again now (I'm currently sitting).  It's hot where I am (about 85 degrees),  and this morning I thought maybe it was that I was over heating a little. Has anyone experienced this?
title: Vision changes
